hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Docker installation sudo apt-get update cat /etc/os* sudo apt-get install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=s390x] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable" sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce
sudo service docker start sleep 20s sudo service docker status
#Service catalog sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y git make export GOPATH=`pwd` mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator git clone https://github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog.git cd service-catalog git checkout v0.1.5
sed -i '15 s/golang/s390x\/golang/' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '21 s/v0.12.3/v0.13.0/' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '23 s/amd64/s390x/' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '/ENV DEP_VERSION/d' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '/$\DEP_VERSION/d' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '27d' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '27i RUN go get -u -v github.com/golang/dep/cmd/dep && \\' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '28i ln -s /go/bin/dep /usr/local/bin/dep' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '31d' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '/etcd-v3.1.10/d' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '31i ENV ETCD_DATA_DIR=/data ETCD_UNSUPPORTED_ARCH=s390x' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '32i RUN mkdir -p /src/github.com/coreos \\' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '33i && cd /src/github.com/coreos \\' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '34i && rm -rf etcd \\' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '35i && git clone https://github.com/coreos/etcd \\' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '36i && cd etcd \\' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '37i && git checkout v3.2.7 \\' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '38i && mkdir -p /data \\' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '39i && ./build \\' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile sed -i '40i && cd bin && cp -rf etcd etcdctl /usr/bin/' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/build/build-image/Dockerfile
git diff cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog sudo -E make build ARCH=s390x export PATH=$GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/bin:$PATH
sed -i '251 s/-race//' $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog/Makefile git diff
cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/kubernetes-incubator/service-catalog sudo -E make test-unit ARCH=s390x
#Note : Added sudo -E because docker is installed with sudo and need to add test user to docker group.
